meanings.definition: A quicker or more direct way to reach a destination or achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: Taking a shortcut through the park saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent2: She found a shortcut to finish her homework faster.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel took a shortcut up the tree, impressing the other animals.
meanings.sent4: His creativity was a shortcut to success in the art world.
meanings.sent5: The shortcut through the tunnel was dark but exciting.

meanings.definition: A key or combination of keys on a computer keyboard that provides a quick way to perform a specific function.
meanings.sent1: Pressing the shortcut Ctrl+C copies text quickly.
meanings.sent2: The shortcut Alt+Tab switches between open windows effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The shortcut key Ctrl+Z became his best friend when editing photos.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced over the keyboard, using shortcut keys like a pro.
meanings.sent5: Remembering the shortcut for 'save' can make your work much easier.

meanings.definition: A shorter route or method that saves time or effort.
meanings.sent1: The new road was a convenient shortcut to the grocery store.
meanings.sent2: She discovered a shortcut to baking the perfect cake.
meanings.sent3: The shortcut through the garden made her daily walk more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: His advice was a helpful shortcut to understanding the complex problem.
meanings.sent5: The shortcut through the forest was a scenic adventure.
